remarks: Closure of subspace join for ` DVecA ` partial vector space. (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
djacl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djacl.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
djacl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
djacl.j $e |- J = ( ( vA ` K ) ` W ) $.
djaclN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X C_ T /\ Y C_ T ) ) -> ( X J Y ) e. ran I ) $.
